Class WekaTaskMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.server.WekaTaskMap

  • public class WekaTaskMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that maintains a map of tasks for execution.

    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
